mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_manual_refund ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, state type, user_id, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, school_id, course_id, receive_date, received, payment_voucher_image_url, refund_voucher_image_url, refund_detail_id, refund_detail, currency_type, amount_name, bank_name, bsb, remarks) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{state}, #{type}, #{userId}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, #{schoolId}, #{courseId}, #{receiveDate}, #{received}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl}, #{refundVoucherImageUrl}, #{refundDetailId}, #{refundDetail}, #{currencyType}, #{amountName}, #{bankName}, #{bsb}, #{remarks});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, state, type, user_id AS userId, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, school_id AS schoolId, course_id AS courseId, receive_date AS receiveDate, received, payment_voucher_image_url AS paymentVoucherImageUrl, refund_voucher_image_url AS refundVoucherImageUrl, refund_detail_id AS refundDetailId, refund_detail AS refundDetail, currency_type AS currencyType, amount_name AS amountName, bank_name AS bankName, bsb, remarks FROM b_manual_refund WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_manual_refund WHERE id =#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
